content_data.subject: Welcome to Bakalr Boutique, {{name}}!
content_data.heading: Welcome to the Family!
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

Thank you for creating your Bakalr Boutique account! We are thrilled to have you join our community of hair care enthusiasts.

As a member, you will enjoy:

  • Exclusive member-only discounts
  • Early access to new products
  • Personalized product recommendations
  • Order tracking and history
  • Wishlist and favorites

Start exploring our premium collection of virgin hair extensions, wigs, and hair care products.
content_data.footer_text: Welcome to Bakalr Boutique! If you did not create this account, please ignore this email.

content_data.subject: Verify your email address
content_data.heading: Please Verify Your Email
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

Thank you for signing up! Please verify your email address to complete your registration and unlock all account features.

This verification link will expire in 24 hours.

If you did not create an account with us, please ignore this email.
content_data.footer_text: This link expires in 24 hours. If you need a new link, please visit our website.

content_data.subject: Reset your password - Bakalr Boutique
content_data.heading: Password Reset Request
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

We received a request to reset the password for your Bakalr Boutique account.

Click the button below to create a new password. This link will expire in 1 hour.

If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.
content_data.footer_text: This link expires in 1 hour. If you did not request this, please ignore this email.

content_data.subject: Your password has been changed
content_data.heading: Password Changed Successfully
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

This email confirms that your Bakalr Boutique account password was successfully changed on {{change_date}}.

If you made this change, no further action is required.

If you did NOT change your password, please reset it immediately and contact our support team.
content_data.footer_text: If you did not make this change, please contact support immediately.

content_data.subject: Your account has been temporarily locked
content_data.heading: Account Security Alert
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

Your Bakalr Boutique account has been temporarily locked due to multiple failed login attempts.

This is a security measure to protect your account. You can unlock your account by resetting your password.

If this was you, please reset your password. If you did not attempt to log in, someone may be trying to access your account.
content_data.footer_text: Your account will automatically unlock after 30 minutes.

content_data.subject: Your verification code: {{otp_code}}
content_data.heading: Your Verification Code
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

Your one-time verification code is:

{{otp_code}}

This code will expire in {{expires_minutes}} minutes.

Enter this code in the app to complete your verification.

Do not share this code with anyone. Bakalr Boutique will never ask for your verification code.
content_data.footer_text: This is an automated security message. If you did not request this code, please ignore this email.

content_data.subject: Verify Your Device - {{verification_code}}
content_data.heading: New Device Detected
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

We detected a login from a new device:

Device:{{device_name}}
Location:{{location}}
Time:{{login_time}}

To verify this device, please enter the following code:

{{verification_code}}

This code expires in {{expires_minutes}} minutes.

If you did not attempt to log in, please secure your account immediately.
content_data.footer_text: This is an automated security message. Do not share this code with anyone.

content_data.subject: New Login to Your Account
content_data.heading: New Login Detected
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

We noticed a new login to your Bakalr Boutique account:

Device:{{device_info}}
Location:{{location}}
IP Address:{{ip_address}}
Time:{{login_time}}

If this was you, you can ignore this email.

If you did not log in, please secure your account immediately by changing your password.
content_data.footer_text: This is an automated security alert from your account.

content_data.subject: [Contact Form] {{subject}}
content_data.heading: New Contact Form Submission
content_data.body:
You have received a new message from the Bakalr Boutique contact form.

{{details_html}}
content_data.footer_text: This message was sent via the Bakalr Boutique contact form.

content_data.subject: We received your message - Bakalr Boutique
content_data.heading: Thank You for Reaching Out!
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

Thank you for contacting Bakalr Boutique! We have received your message regarding:

{{subject}}

Our team will review your message and get back to you within 24-48 business hours.

In the meantime, feel free to browse our premium collection of hair products.
content_data.footer_text: This is an automated response. Please do not reply to this email.

content_data.subject: Order Confirmed! #{{order_number}}
content_data.heading: Thank You for Your Order!
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

Great news! We have received your order and it is being processed.

Order Number:{{order_number}}
Order Date:{{order_date}}
Total:{{order_total}}

We will send you another email with tracking information once your order ships.
content_data.footer_text: Thank you for shopping with Bakalr Boutique!

content_data.subject: Your order is on its way! #{{order_number}}
content_data.heading: Your Order Has Shipped! 🚚
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

Exciting news! Your order has been shipped and is on its way to you.

Order Number:{{order_number}}
Tracking Number:{{tracking_number}}
Carrier:{{carrier}}
Estimated Delivery:{{estimated_delivery}}

You can track your package using the button below.
content_data.footer_text: Thank you for shopping with Bakalr Boutique!

content_data.subject: Your order has been delivered! #{{order_number}}
content_data.heading: Package Delivered! 📬
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

Your Bakalr Boutique order has been delivered!

Order Number:{{order_number}}
Delivered On:{{delivery_date}}

We hope you love your new products! If you have any questions or concerns about your order, please do not hesitate to contact us.

We would love to hear what you think! Please consider leaving a review.
content_data.footer_text: Thank you for being a valued customer!

content_data.subject: Order Cancelled #{{order_number}}
content_data.heading: Order Cancellation Confirmed
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

Your order #{{order_number}} has been cancelled as requested.

If you paid for this order, a refund will be processed within 5-10 business days to your original payment method.

Refund Amount:{{refund_amount}}

We are sorry to see you go! If there was an issue with your order or if you have any feedback, we would love to hear from you.
content_data.footer_text: We hope to see you again soon!

content_data.subject: Refund Processed - {{refund_amount}}
content_data.heading: Your Refund Has Been Processed
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

We have processed your refund for order #{{order_number}}.

Refund Amount:{{refund_amount}}
Refund Method:{{refund_method}}
Expected Arrival:5-10 business days

The refund will appear on your original payment method. Processing times may vary depending on your bank or card issuer.

content_data.subject: You left something behind! 🛒
content_data.heading: Forgot Something?
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

We noticed you left some beautiful items in your cart! Your premium hair products are waiting for you.

{{cart_items_html}}

Complete your purchase now and treat yourself to the gorgeous hair you deserve.
content_data.footer_text: Your cart items are saved for 7 days.

content_data.subject: Its back! {{product_name}} is now in stock
content_data.heading: Great News! Your Item is Back!
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

The item you have been waiting for is back in stock!

{{product_name}}

{{product_price}}

Do not miss out - popular items sell fast! Grab yours before its gone again.
content_data.footer_text: You received this email because you requested to be notified.

content_data.subject: How are you loving your new hair? ⭐
content_data.heading: Share Your Experience!
content_data.body:
Hi {{name}},

Its been a few weeks since your order arrived, and we would love to know what you think!

Your feedback helps other customers make informed decisions and helps us improve.

As a thank you for your review, you will receive a 10% discount code for your next purchase!
content_data.footer_text: Thank you for being part of the Bakalr Boutique family!
